div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1042 Dabla-Gomi, Samtredia raion, Geor- gia, 1929 Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: 110 AR. In silver vase, wrapped in linen cloth Colchis: hemidr. Disposition: Tiflis Makalatiia, SA 5 (1940), pp. 266-8 Zograph, "Nakhodky," 45 Pakhomov IV, 992 Kuftin, Materialy k arkheologii Kolkhidy II (Tiflis, 1950), pp. 2, 112 â€ Golenko-Kapanadze, NE 6 (1966), pp. 31-61
